pr_title: Add custom keys to Crashlytics reports

timeline.message: Add custom keys to Crashlytics reports

timeline.bodyText: How do you feel about Collections.emptyMap() (or ImmutableMap.of())
timeline.author: jakeouellette

timeline.bodyText: Not sure it matters, but just a note here that unmodifiable maps can still change, just not by the user of the returned value.
timeline.author: jakeouellette

replies.bodyText: 👍 Discussed this offline - the ConcurrentHashMap implementation guarantees this is safe, but we should definitely revisit it later.
replies.author: mrwillis21

timeline.bodyText: Since this is a copy, you might consider setting a capacity, e.g., new ArrayList<>(attributes.size())
timeline.author: jakeouellette
